article.title: ViaSat Awarded $9.3 Million Contract for Integrated Waveform Development and Fielding
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: ViaSat Incorporated will continue to develop the UHF satellite communications (SATCOM) integrated waveform channel controller under a $9.3 million contract awarded by the Defense Information Systems Agency. The second phase of the integrated waveform development enables demand assigned services on UHF SATCOM networks to support new applications that require better performance and higher channel throughput.
